wikipedia_page.main: Frank A. Cowell is Professor of Economics at the London School of Economics and Political Science. His work includes important contributions to the fields of income and wealth distribution, inequality, poverty and taxation.

response: * Frank Cowell, professor at the London School of Economics and Political Science
*Frank Cowell - Professor of Economics at the London School of Economics

The Journal of Economic Inequality is a quarterly peer-reviewed academic journal covering the study of economic and social inequality. It was established in 2003 and is published by Springer Science+Business Media. The editor-in-chief is Frank Cowell (London School of Economics and Political Science). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 0.980.
